author: grahamd
msg: Added support to cookies for "httponly" attribute, an extension originally
created by Microsoft, but now getting more widespread use in the battle

author: grahamd
msg: When in a sub request, when a request is the result of an internal
redirect, or when when returning from such a request, the req.main,
req.prev and req.next members now correctly return a reference to the
original Python request object wrapper first created for the specific
request_rec instance rather than creating a new distinct Python request
object. This means that any data added explicitly to a request object can

author: wrowe
msg: Catch *.html files (where did our clean multilingual layout go!?!)

author: skitching
msg: Add new Digester.setStackAction feature; this allows user code to monitor the digester
stacks. In particular it helps with tracking info on xml file source for created objects.
